title: The Distant lens
creator_credit: Glenda Hambly, Owen Paterson, Paul D. Barron and Perth Institute of Film and Television
brief_description: Looks at the past of Western Australia, taking the audience through a kaleidoscope of events, including two wars, Royal visits, the Group Settlement, the first aeroplane flights, and the 1920 centenary parades. Composed of photographs and archive film.
creator_credit_for_label: Glenda Hambly, Owen Paterson, Paul D. Barron and Perth Institute of Film and Television
